ComicInfo.Title: Mukbang; I Can't Take You Anywhere; Something is Killing The Children: A Monster Hunter Walks Into a Bar, Part Two; Kampfgeist; The War, Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
As the nightmarish modern horror anthology continues, can you survive part 3 of the Garth Ennis & Becky Cloonan serial “The War” as well as the 3rd monstrous Something is Killing the Children tale from James Tynion IV and Werther Dell’Edera?
In addition to even more of the darkest stories from the lightless corners of the industry’s greatest minds, this issue also features “The Foster” by Eisner and GLAAD media award nominated writer Steve Orlando (Midnighter, Scarlet Witch) and A.L. Kaplan (DC Pride 2023, Stuff of Nightmares), a gruesome story delving into the realm of body horror and loneliness.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-10-01 09:43:43. [CVDB1071752]
ComicInfo.Writer: Andy Lanning, Garth Ennis, James Tynion IV, Michael Conrad, Robert Hack
ComicInfo.Penciller: Becky Cloonan, Martin Morrazo, Robert Hack, Trevor Hairsine, Werther Dell'Edera
ComicInfo.Inker: Becky Cloonan, Martin Morrazo, Robert Hack, Trevor Hairsine, Werther Dell'Edera
ComicInfo.Colorist: Chris O'Halloran, Giovanna Niro, Miquel Muerto, Rain Beredo, Robert Hack, Tamra Bonvillain
ComicInfo.Letterer: AndWorld Design, Ed Dukeshire, Lucas Gattoni, Pat Brosseau, Robert Hack
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Annie Wu, Giovanna Niro, Jenny Frison, Matteo Scalera, Paolo Manuel Rivera
